description:
With this change we should be setting the microversion attribute on the test API client for functional tests to hit microversions:

https://review.openstack.org/#/c/284257/

It's still possible to get around that by using the X-OpenStack-Nova-API-Version header in the request that goes to the client.

For consistency, we should use the api.microversion attribute on the test client.

As a test, we can see failures if we force that to change:

https://gist.github.com/mriedem/54c70579b52d26d80af9

It sounds like there are changes to make if we remove that support from the functional tests and when we remove it, there is some code that was built into the tests to enable it, which would be effectively dead code so that would have to be removed at the same time.

This bug is just for tracking that cleanup TODO.
title: Stop using 'X-OpenStack-Nova-API-Version' header directly in functional tests
